title: File Upload Success with Valid MP3 File
description: Verify that the application accepts a valid MP3 file under 10MB uploaded via drag-and-drop and shows correct file preview.

steps.description: Navigate to Homepage
Drag and drop a valid MP3 file smaller than 10MB onto the file upload area
Confirm file preview displays correct file name, size, and duration

title: File Upload Success with Valid WAV File
description: Verify that the application accepts a valid WAV file under 10MB uploaded via click-to-upload and shows correct file preview.

steps.description: Navigate to Homepage
Click file upload area to open file selector and choose a valid WAV file smaller than 10MB
Confirm file preview displays correct file name, size, and duration

title: File Upload Rejects Invalid File Type
description: Verify that uploading a file with an unsupported format (e.g., .txt, .jpg) triggers an error message and does not allow upload.

steps.description: Navigate to Homepage
Attempt to upload a file with unsupported file type (e.g., text or image file)
Check that an error message about invalid file type appears and upload is rejected

title: File Upload Rejects Oversized File
description: Verify that uploading a valid audio file exceeding 10MB triggers an error message preventing the upload.

steps.description: Navigate to Homepage
Try to upload a valid MP3 or WAV file larger than 10MB
Verify an error message about file size limit is shown and upload is rejected

title: Start Audio Separation Processing
description: Verify that clicking 'Separate Audio' after valid file upload navigates to Processing Page and starts simulated AI stem extraction with progress displayed.

steps.description: Upload valid MP3 or WAV file under 10MB on Homepage
Click 'Separate Audio' button
Check navigation to Processing Page showing animated progress bar and current stem extraction status

title: Progress Bar Displays Correct Percentage and Stem Status
description: Verify that ProgressBar component animates processing progress with correct percentage, current stem extraction name, and estimated time remaining updates.

steps.description: On Processing Page, monitor progress bar during stem extraction simulation
Verify progress percentage increments correctly over time
Verify current stem extraction label updates accurately as each stem is processed
Verify estimated time remaining updates realistically during processing

title: Cancel Processing Returns to Homepage
description: Verify that clicking the cancel button on Processing Page aborts the stem extraction simulation and navigates back to the Homepage.

steps.description: Start audio processing on Processing Page
Click the cancel button while processing is ongoing
Check that the processing stops and the app navigates back to Homepage

title: Results Page Displays All Four Stem Players
description: Verify that upon processing completion, Results Page loads showing four color-coded StemPlayers for vocals, drums, bass, and other.

steps.description: Complete audio separation processing to navigate to Results Page
Confirm presence of four StemPlayer components with correct colors: sky blue for vocals, emerald green for drums, amber for bass, pink for other

title: StemPlayer Playback Controls Functionality
description: Verify that each StemPlayer supports play/pause, volume adjustment, mute toggle, and seek functionality for its stem audio.

steps.description: On Results Page, select each StemPlayer one by one
Use play button to start stem playback
Check that audio plays correctly
Pause playback and verify audio stops
Adjust volume control slider and verify volume changes
Toggle mute button and verify audio is muted/unmuted
Use seek bar to move playback position and confirm audio jumps accordingly

title: Download Individual Stem Files
description: Verify that clicking download button on each StemPlayer downloads the correct stem audio file.

steps.description: On Results Page, click download button on each StemPlayer component
Confirm that respective stem audio file is downloaded with appropriate file name

title: Download All Stems Button Downloads All Files
description: Verify that clicking 'Download All Stems' button downloads all four stem audio files as a batch successfully.

steps.description: On Results Page, click the 'Download All Stems' button
Verify that a batch download or archive including all four stem audio files starts correctly

title: Process Another File Resets State and Navigates to Homepage
description: Verify that clicking 'Process Another File' resets application state and navigates to Homepage ready for new upload.

steps.description: On Results Page, click 'Process Another File' button
Check navigation to Homepage and that previous state is cleared allowing new file upload

title: Ensure All Audio Processing Occurs Client-Side
description: Verify that no audio data is transmitted to the server during file upload and stem extraction simulations, ensuring privacy compliance.

steps.description: Upload a valid audio file and start processing
Monitor network activity to confirm no audio file or stem data is sent to any server

title: Responsive Design on Mobile Devices
description: Verify that Homepage, Processing Page, and Results Page layout and functionality adapt correctly to various mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the app on different mobile devices or use browser emulation for mobile screen sizes
Check that file upload area, progress bar, stem players, buttons, header, and footer are fully visible and usable without layout issues

title: Responsive Design on Desktop Devices
description: Verify the UI components render and function correctly on standard desktop screen resolutions.

steps.description: Open the app on desktop browser
Verify Homepage hero, file upload, Processing Page progress bar, Results Page stem grid, and header/footer display correctly and controls function as expected

title: Error Message Display for Invalid File Upload Attempts
description: Verify that invalid file upload attempts display clear error messages and prevent further action until corrected.

steps.description: Attempt to upload invalid file type or oversized files on Homepage
Validate that appropriate error messages appear near file upload area and the 'Separate Audio' button remains disabled

title: Verify Playback Controls Accessibility
description: Verify that playback controls on StemPlayers are accessible via keyboard navigation and screen readers for better accessibility.

steps.description: On Results Page, navigate StemPlayer controls using keyboard tabbing
Confirm focus on each control (play/pause, volume, mute, seek, download) and that screen reader announces their labels and states correctly

title: Homepage Loads Hero Section and File Upload Area
description: Verify that the Homepage loads successfully with the hero section visible and file upload area ready to accept files.

steps.description: Navigate to the Homepage URL
Check that the hero section text and images are visible and the file upload area is displayed and interactive
